Lyrics:
2 ContributorsDare Lyrics[Verse 1]
Don’t ask, don’t tell, get away from it
I’m busy looking like an overdose, I’m good at it
I don’t have time to tell you now
Do you think you can hear the door shutting?
Drowning out with all of the blood you’re sucking
Find another dog to doubt, yeah

[Chorus]
You know what to do
Find a person who looks just like you
No, not there
No, nowhere
I don’t care
It’s all the same
Flicker like a witch inside the flames
I don’t care
I dream therefore I dare

[Verse 2]
So seek out your preacher and teach ‘em the secrets
‘The creature believer’ (repeated misdemeanours)
Don’t ask, don’t tell, get away from it
No love? No, can’t get enough of it

[Verse 3]
So take your time with your rhetoric
Make your mind up and settle it
Heart, keep it separate
Hard when you measure it
So open up like a haemorrhage
Walk this wild you’re weathering
Heart, keep it separate
Just get away from it
You might also like[Chorus]
You know what to do
Find a person who looks just like you
No, not there
No, nowhere
I don’t care
It’s all the same
Flicker like a witch inside the flames
I don’t care
I dream therefore I dare

[Bridge]
So pay me now and I’ll run far away
You won’t be seeing me
I’m such a pain
Oh, what a shame

[Chorus]
You know what to do
Find a person who looks just like you
No, not there
No, nowhere
I don’t care
It’s all the same
Flicker like a witch inside the flames
I don’t care
I dream therefore I dare

Find a person who looks just like you
No, not there
No, nowhere
I don’t care
It’s all the same
Flicker like a witch inside the flames
I don’t care
